name: Deep Sea School
description:
Down in the sea, young fishes go to school to learn reading, writing, counting, and others fish shenanigans. You play a little shark, trying their best to be a good shark. One day they'll be a big adult shark, with adult shark responsibilities and lifestyle. But for the moment, you're a kid, and it's playtime. So enjoy some fun! There's a lot of fishes to play with. It's a big school, after all.

Use arrows to move, X to attack, and Z to talk.

This game was created with Superpowers game framework.

Music created with LMMS, SFX with Bfrx.

Fonts used : Ataristocrat and Sticker from BitFontMaker2.

Source code available on Github.
